turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order to medium gluten-free crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (s) I was thinking for one of them to be the chicken ranch pizza toppings and for the other one the margarita.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, for the first, did you want the chicken, bacon, ranch special or did you want to exclude the bacon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 2 medium gluten free crust pizzas, one chicken ranch, and the other margherita, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to carry it out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.
